title: Infinite Craft Versus

fields.name: Every phase make someone fight you in getting a certain thing in infinite craft [<https:
fields.value:
//neal.fun/infinite-craft/>]
* The goal will be decided by the host
* If you already have the thing then the word will be rerolled
* The winner may decide the fate of the looser. Possible fates are the following: Death, Conversion to allignment, Heal, Investigate for exact role.
* If this role wins and chooses "Conversion to allignment" against a member of the town they will instead be dealt the "Death" fate.
* Battles last till one of the fighting participants have gotten the thing. This may last between phases.
Wincon: Town
